name: DC Super Hero Girls: Super Hero High Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which Amazonian princess was the first of the hero girls to be shown after the opening credits?
questions.explanation:
Wonder Woman.

	Wonder Woman, also known as Princess Diana Prince, was fighting Killer Croc in the opening scene. She and a couple of the other girls, along with Beast Boy, bested him in the fight.

questions.text: Which of the hero girls, after talking to her aunt Martha, headed off to school as a new student?
questions.explanation:
Supergirl.

	In her first scene Supergirl was practising what she would say when she met Wonder Woman. Then her Aunt Martha told her to get ready for school. Martha and Jonathan Kent were the the adopted parents of Superman in the same continuity.

questions.text: Which of the "hero" girls was not a student, but a school employee at the beginning of the movie?
questions.explanation:
Barbara Gordon.

	Babs and her father were talking when Cheetah busted in on them with a busted phone from the earlier fight. Cheetah called her a "nonnie" meaning that Barbara didn't have any actual superpowers. By the end of the movie she had enrolled in the school as a student.

options: It wasn't explained, just said that it was off limits.
questions.explanation:
A teleportation device.

	Supergirl accidentally discovered them when looking for her dorm. Principal Waller then gave her a tour of the room since she had missed the freshman orientation.

questions.text: What fictional city, home to the Daily Planet, was Super Hero High located in?
questions.explanation:
Metropolis.

	The Daily Planet globe can be seen dotting the skyline in a scene with Supergirl and Barbara early in the made-for-television movie. Later on in the film the city is mentioned by name.

questions.text: Vice-Principal Grodd wasn't human. What type of animal was the reformed criminal?
questions.explanation:
Gorilla.

	His full name was Gorilla Grodd, and he was a criminal before he came to work at Super Hero High. Several of the students realized that and accused him of being the villain trying to sneak into the boom tubes.

questions.text: Who was the first villain Supergirl joined her classmates in fighting?
questions.explanation:
Giganta.

	Giganta was stealing jewelry in downtown Metropolis when the team confronted her. Supergirl wasn't quite ready and ended up injuring one of her teammates. Supergirl went back to the school and was tricked into opening the door to the boom tube room by Granny Goodness.

questions.text: Why did Granny Goodness order Big Barda not to kill Supergirl?
questions.correct: She would be a good addition to the team.
options: They were about conquering, not killing.
She would fetch a high dollar on a slave market.
They didn't have enough Kryptonite to finish her off.
questions.explanation:
She would be a good addition to the team.

	Big Barda blasted Supergirl with Kryptonite, but only enough to knock her out. They then left a chunk of the rock next to her to keep her out of commission before she could be turned to their side. Barbara got rid of the rock before Supergirl could be harmed further.

questions.text: Which member of the Bat family helped Supergirl battle Granny Goodness' minions?
questions.explanation:
Batgirl.

	Batgirl, or Barbara Gordon, created a device to stop the mind control device from working on Supergirl. It was hidden as a pair of earrings. Supergirl then gave Barbara back one of the earrings and insisted that she come with her to save the school. That was the first time Barbara called herself Batgirl.

questions.text: Granny disguised a giant explosive device as what everyday object?
options: A statue placed in front of the school
questions.explanation:
A cookie jar.

	It was one of her Granny Grenades. It housed her chocolate chip cookies that she was constantly giving away as the school librarian and hid the explosives. Supergirl managed to fly the grenade away before it destroyed anything at the school.
